Description: Peavey Mantis Lt Vintage Electric Guitar Kahler Flyer Tremolo Bridge sn 02173277 Condition: Good used condition, with some scuffs and scratches. Headstock has some minor dings and dents. Tuners, nut, neck, fretboard, and bridge are all in good condition. Neck appears to be straight and action is even. The electronics were tested and seem to be working well, but this guitar has not been pushed to its limits. There is a truss rod in place. New strings will be required, and there is no case included. Measurements: Full Length: 42" Lower Bout: 14" Upper Bout: 10" Nut to saddle: 25.5" Notes: Please see photos for additional detail and feel free to ask questions.
